00094     // OPERATORS
00095     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 #ifndef SWIG
00097     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &aOut,
00098                                                             const PropertySet &aSet) {
00099         aOut << "\nProperty Set:\n";
00100         for(int i=0;i<aSet.getSize();i++) aOut << *aSet.get(i) << "\n";
00101         return(aOut);
00102     }
00103 #endif
00104     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105     // ACCESS
00106     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 public:

00120 #endif
